content.rendered:
Best mobile card readers for businesses in Los Angeles.

Mobile card readers offer flexibility and convenience, allowing your business to accept card payments on the go, at events, markets, or wherever your customers are. 

Accept Payments Now

Our mobile card readers work with both iOS and Android devices, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of smartphones and tablets for effortless payment acceptance.

  • Fast Set-up
  • Low Rates
  • Flexible and Fast
Apply Today

Leading Los Angeles credit card processor with mobile card readers.

Powerful POS

Everything you need to get your business started. 

Accept On-the-Go

Run your business from anywhere your customers are. 

Speak to an Expert

Full-featured POS.

Our mobile card reader includes full-featured POS software that empowers businesses with advanced capabilities. It allows you to manage inventory, process payments, track sales, and generate detailed reports, all from the convenience of your mobile device. This comprehensive POS solution ensures you have the tools needed to enhance customer service and streamline operations, making it an invaluable asset for businesses on the go. 

Top-notch security.

The mobile card reader prioritizes the highest levels of security, offering encryption and fraud prevention features to protect sensitive payment data. With stringent security measures in place, businesses and customers can trust that their transactions are safe and secure, minimizing the risk of fraud or data breaches. 

01 02

Step 1

Apply for an account and get approved in as little as 24 hours.

Step 2

Integrate with your existing software or get started with our tools. 

Step 3

Enjoy low fees and 24/7 customer support with a real person. 

Leading credit card processing with mobile card readers in Los Angeles.

Los Angeles
